item.title: Coinbase股价飙升，逢低买盘押注加密货币市场触底
item.description: 美国最大加密货币交易所公布季度业绩疲软后，Coinbase Global Inc.股价次日企稳，因大批逢低买盘认定最糟情况已反映在股价中。【原文：Coinbase Global Inc. shares found firmer footing a day after the largest US crypto exchange reported weak quarterly results, as a cohort of dip buyers concluded the worst had already been priced in.】

item.title: 通胀数据公布后，人工智能担忧持续发酵，股市走势震荡
item.description: 周五股市方向不明，因人工智能引发的颠覆性担忧与通胀数据低于预期后可能进一步降息的预期相互抵消。【原文：Stocks struggled for direction Friday as fears of AI disruptions weigh against the potential for more interest rate cuts after a cooler-than-expected inflation reading.】

item.title: 1月美国CPI报告五大要点
item.description: 以下是1月份消费者价格指数报告的关键要点：【原文：Here are key takeaways from the January consumer price index report:】

item.title: 比特币交易员警告：6万美元关口或触发清算潮
item.description: 随着比特币艰难挣脱当前低迷状态，多项指标显示若跌破6万美元关口，将引发新一轮剧烈震荡。【原文：As Bitcoin struggles to climb out of its current funk, several indicators suggest any breach of the $60,000 level would unleash a fresh bout of extreme turbulence.】

item.title: Infleqtion公开亮相将检验量子狂潮的持久力
item.description: 空白支票公司股东批准与量子计算企业Infleqtion Inc.合并上市，此举为该领域更多企业上市铺平道路，同时迫使相关公司证明其技术正日益趋于成熟。【原文：Shareholders in the blank-check vehicle taking quantum computing firm Infleqtion Inc. public have approved the tie-up, setting the stage for more debuts in the sector and piling pressure on companies to show the technology is getting closer to maturity.】

item.title: 施恩菲尔德聘请法国巴黎银行顶级大宗商品交易员亚瑟·古森斯
item.description: 据知情人士透露，多策略对冲基金巨头Schonfeld Strategic Advisors LLC已聘请法国巴黎银行大宗商品交易联席主管Arthur Goossens。【原文：Multistrategy hedge fund giant Schonfeld Strategic Advisors LLC has hired BNP Paribas SA’s co-head of commodities trading, Arthur Goossens, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Shield AI正洽谈融资10亿美元，估值达120亿美元
item.description: 据知情人士透露，国防初创公司Shield AI正就融资事宜进行磋商，拟筹集高达10亿美元资金。此轮融资将使其估值在不到一年内翻倍增长。【原文：Defense startup Shield AI is in talks to raise as much as $1 billion in a deal that would more than double its valuation in less than a year, according to people familiar with the efforts.】

item.title: 加拿大顶级银行监管机构称资本处于"金发姑娘区间"
item.description: 加拿大银行监管机构负责人彼得·劳特利奇反驳了针对该国最大贷款机构面临沉重资本负担的批评，他辩称现行监管措施恰恰处于"恰到好处的状态"。【原文：Peter Routledge, who leads Canada’s bank regulator, fired back against criticisms that the country’s biggest lenders face onerous capital burdens, arguing that current regulations are instead in a “Goldilocks zone.”】

item.title: 交易员认为美联储第三次降息概率达50%，因通胀趋缓
item.description: 美国国债价格大涨，投资者预期美联储将在2026年三次降息，此前公布的美国通胀数据低于市场预期。【原文：US Treasuries jumped and investors priced in higher expectations that the Federal Reserve will lower interest rates three times in 2026 after a reading of US inflation came in below forecasts.】

item.title: 美国将阿里巴巴、比亚迪列入协助中国军方的企业名单
item.description: 五角大楼将阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司、百度公司和比亚迪股份有限公司列入协助中国军方的企业名单，此举相当于美国政府对投资者的警告，尽管该名单不具有直接法律效力。【原文：The Pentagon added Alibaba Group Holding Ltd., Baidu Inc. and BYD Co. to a list of companies that aid the Chinese military, a move that amounts to a US government warning for investors even though it carries no direct legal repercussions.】

item.title: 英格兰银行行长皮尔称利率"略低"，应维持不变
item.description: 英格兰银行首席经济学家休·皮尔警告称，为使通胀率回归目标水平，利率需在3.75%的水平维持更长时间，并补充称借贷成本并未给英国企业带来困扰。【原文：Bank of England Chief Economist Huw Pill warned that interest rates need to be held at 3.75% for longer to bring inflation back to target, adding that borrowing costs are not causing trouble for British businesses.】

item.title: 美国1月核心CPI因服务成本上涨而符合预期
item.description: 年初美国核心通胀率如预期上升，因服务成本上涨抵消了商品价格的稳定。【原文：Underlying US inflation rose as expected at the start of the year as higher services costs offset stable goods prices.】

item.title: 默茨称已与马克龙就核威慑问题进行会谈
item.description: 德国财政部长弗里德里希·梅尔茨表示，他正与法国总统埃马纽埃尔·马克龙就欧洲核武器的未来展开讨论。【原文：Chancellor Friedrich Merz said he’s in discussions with French President Emmanuel Macron about the future of Europe’s nuclear weapons.】

item.title: 联合国称燃油封锁对古巴造成"日益严重"的冲击
item.description: 联合国警告称，美国旨在切断古巴燃料供应的行动正对该岛产生"日益严重的影响"，涉及医院、公共卫生、供水和食品分发等领域。【原文：The US campaign to starve Cuba of fuel is having “an increasingly severe impact” on the island, affecting hospitals, public sanitation, water delivery and food distribution, the United Nations warned.】

item.title: 人工智能初创公司Legora正洽谈将估值提升至60亿美元，实现三倍增长
item.description: 知情人士透露，Legora正筹备新一轮融资，这将使这家法律人工智能公司的估值翻三倍至60亿美元，距离其上一轮融资仅过去四个月。【原文：Legora is in talks to raise funds that would triple the legal artificial intelligence maker’s valuation to $6 billion, four months after its last financing round, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 美国1月消费者价格涨幅低于预期
item.description: 一名购物者在旧金山联合广场附近提着购物袋。摄影师：David Paul Morris/彭博社【原文：A shopper carries bags in the Union Square neighborhood of San Francisco. Photographer: David Paul Morris/Bloomberg】

item.title: 私募信贷的软件押注比表面看起来更大
item.description: 浏览Pricefx官网时，该公司对自身的定位不言而喻。其首页醒目地标注着"顶尖定价软件"，并配以"卓越定价软件让梦想成真"的标语。仅首页页面上，"软件"一词就出现了十多次。【原文：A quick scan of Pricefx’s website leaves little doubt how the company sees itself. “The #1 Leading Pricing Software” is splashed across its homepage. As is “Great Pricing Software Makes Dreams Reality.” In all, “software” appears more than a dozen times on that first screen alone.】

item.title: 美团警告：中国餐饮业竞争加剧或致35亿美元亏损
item.description: 美团警告称其年度亏损额将创至少2021年以来新高，凸显出外卖行业残酷的价格战正如何侵蚀中国最大互联网公司的利润空间。【原文：Meituan warned of its biggest annual loss since at least 2021, underscoring the extent to which a brutal price-based war in food delivery is eroding margins at China’s largest internet companies.】

item.title: 捷克央行称核心通胀仍是利率谨慎之因
item.description: 捷克央行表示，1月份核心通胀率仍居高不下，这继续构成货币政策审慎的理由。【原文：The Czech central bank said that core inflation remained elevated in January and continued to represent a reason for monetary policy caution.】

item.title: 英格兰银行行长皮尔表示，当前利率的紧缩程度尚不明确
item.description: 英国央行首席经济学家休·皮尔周五在伦敦表示，货币政策对需求的抑制程度正变得越来越难以判断。【原文：Bank of England Chief Economist Huw Pill warns it’s becoming harder to tell how much monetary policy is weighing on demand, speaking in London Friday.】

item.title: 香港监管机构敦促IPO审计师保障质量
item.description: 香港会计监管机构敦促处理首次公开募股的审计师评估自身资源和专业能力是否充足，并警告称上市活动激增可能对质量构成压力。【原文：Hong Kong’s accounting regulator urged auditors handling initial public offerings to assess whether they have sufficient resources and expertise, warning that a surge in listing activity could put pressure on quality.】

item.title: 伦敦石油交易峰会力图穿透市场噪音
item.description: 推动价格变动的因素范围之广实属罕见。【原文：The range of factors driving prices has been extraordinary.】

item.title: 阿布扎比斥资2370亿美元组建金融公司，提升投资实力
item.description: 国际控股公司正组建一家新的金融服务控股公司，该机构将管理约8700亿迪拉姆（2370亿美元）的资产，这是阿布扎比最大上市公司的最新整合举措。【原文：International Holding Co. is creating a new financial-services holding company that will oversee about 870 billion dirhams ($237 billion) in assets, the latest consolidation move by Abu Dhabi’s biggest listed firm.】

item.title: PBB股价暴跌，归咎于SRT成本导致盈利前景疲软
item.description: 德意志抵押债券银行股份公司股价暴跌，此前该公司对2026年盈利前景作出谨慎预测，指出大规模风险转移的高昂成本是主要原因。【原文：Shares in Deutsche Pfandbriefbank AG plummeted after it gave a muted profit outlook for 2026, pointing to the high costs of a significant risk transfer as a key reason.】

item.title: 英伟达新兴竞争对手发现人工智能芯片市场霸主的统治地位出现裂痕
item.description: 近期举措暗示市场新领域竞争加剧【原文：Recent moves hint at competition in a new slice of the market】

item.title: 人工智能巨头效仿加密货币策略，力图助盟友当选国会议员
item.description:
随着选民对人工智能影响的担忧日益加剧，一个由行业支持的新超级政治行动委员会正助力那些主张放宽监管的候选人。【原文：

As voters grow concerned over AI's impact, a new industry-backed super PAC is helping candidates who favor a lighter regulatory touch. 

】

item.title: 朱迪·谢尔顿时隔多年重返政坛，此前曾错失美联储职位
item.description: 这位前美联储提名人希望对央行制定利率的模型进行彻底重新思考。【原文：The former Fed nominee wants a wholesale rethink of how the central bank should model interest rates.】

item.title: 迷因股崩盘后，巴西科格纳股价飙升200%
item.description: Cogna Educação在疫情期间经历了其迷因股时刻。巴西散户投资者蜂拥买入这家营利性教育公司的股票，将其股价推高至疯狂水平，最终在股价崩盘时蒙受重创。【原文：Cogna Educação had its meme-stock moment during the pandemic. Brazilian retail investors piled into the for-profit education company’s shares, bid it up wildly, and got burned when it all came crashing down.】

item.title: 欧洲期货交易所称，在与美国证交会磋商后，欧盟债券期货向美国交易者开放
item.description: 德意志交易所集团旗下欧洲期货交易所表示，其新推出的欧盟债券期货将向美国交易商开放，此举旨在消除该问题相关的法律不确定性。【原文：Deutsche Börse AG’s Eurex exchange said its new European Union bond futures are open to US traders, as it seeks to clear up legal uncertainty over the issue.】

item.title: 阿波罗正与Revolut商谈为其欧洲客户提供资金支持
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司正与Revolut有限公司展开初步洽谈，拟通过该金融科技公司的平台向欧洲零售客户提供其基金产品。【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. is in early talks to partner with Revolut Ltd. and offer its funds to retail customers in Europe through the fintech’s platform.】
